name: Jump (itch) (KiraPotato)
description:
Jump up and never stop! Avoid enemies and dodge their fire and attacks to reach new heights!

This project is currently is just a test build and if it gets any interest will certainly be improved upon.

The levels are endless and the monsters and items are randomly spawned.

For suggestions, bugs and criticism please leave a comment or email me at kirazpotato@gmail.com! All input is appreciated!
